item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Chairil Anwar
item.description: "sekali berarti sesudah itu mati" -- Chairil Anwar

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "I like your Christ, I do not like your Christians. Your Christians are so unlike your Christ." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.description: "orang Jawa itu juga manusia, pembaca!" -- Multatuli (Eduard Douwes Dekker)

item.description: "People are capable, at any time in their lives, of doing what they dream of." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Orang boleh pandai setinggi langit, tapi selama ia tidak menulis, ia akan hilang di dalam masyarakat dan dari sejarah. Menulis adalah bekerja untuk keabadian." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by pramoedya ananta toer
item.description: "Dalam hidup kita, cuma satu yang kita punya, yaitu keberanian. Kalau tidak punya itu, lantas apa harga hidup kita ini?" -- pramoedya ananta toer

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Berterimakasihlah pada segala yang memberi kehidupan." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Kalian boleh maju dalam pelajaran, mungkin mencapai deretan gelar kesarjanaan apa saja, tapi tanpa mencintai sastra, kalian tinggal hanya hewan yang pandai." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Kalau mati, dengan berani; kalau hidup, dengan berani. Kalau keberanian tidak ada, itulah sebabnya setiap bangsa asing bisa jajah kita." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: gonk bukan pahlawan berwajah tampan add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Kalian pemuda, kalau kalian tidak punya keberanian, sama saja dengan ternak karena fungsi hidupnya hanya beternak diri" -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer
